alert.note: Alert for Bracken (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 4:17PM EDT until July 02 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Bracken County in northern Kentucky... South central Clermont County in southwestern Ohio... Southwestern Brown County in southwestern Ohio... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 417 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Neville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Augusta, Higginsport, Neville, Chilo, Woolcutt, Willow Grove, Bradford, Foster, Johnsville, Rock Springs, Utopia, Chatham, Stoney Point and Aa Highway at State Route 19. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
